info.name: MyPOSCore API
info.description:
Collection untuk MyPOSCore Backend API - Multi-tenant & Multi-branch POS System

Features:
- Multi-tenancy support dengan tenant code
- Multi-branch per tenant dengan branch code
- JWT authentication (24h expiry)
- User management per branch
- Role-based access control (superadmin, tenantadmin, branchadmin, staff)
- Product & Inventory management
- Order & Payment processing
- FAQ & Terms & Conditions management
- Superadmin management panel

Architecture:
- Separate services: RegisterService & LoginService
- Clean architecture with handlers, services, models
- PostgreSQL database with GORM
- Gin web framework

Roles:
- superadmin: Full system access, manage tenants, FAQ & TnC
- tenantadmin: Manage tenant-level resources
- branchadmin: Manage branch-level resources
- user: Regular user access

Public Endpoints:
- /health - Health check
- /dev/tenants - List all tenants (for testing)
- /api/v1/faq - FAQ endpoints (public read access)
- /api/v1/tnc - Terms & Conditions endpoints (public read access)

request.description: Endpoint untuk mengecek status server, versi aplikasi, koneksi database, uptime, dan resource usage

response.name: Health Check Success

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan daftar semua tenant aktif. Tidak memerlukan authentication token.

Gunakan endpoint ini untuk:
- Mendapatkan tenant_id untuk testing
- Explorasi data demo tenant
- Development & debugging

response.name: List Tenants Success

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan daftar branch dari tenant tertentu. Tidak memerlukan authentication token.

Ganti :tenant_id dengan ID tenant yang didapat dari endpoint /dev/tenants

Contoh:
- /dev/tenants/17/branches - Branches Warung Makan Sejahtera
- /dev/tenants/18/branches - Branches Fashion Store

request.description:
Get list of all tenants in the system with pagination support. All authenticated users can access.

Query Parameters:
- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of tenants
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of tenant items

query.description: Filter to show only active categories

request.description:
Get list of all product categories for the authenticated tenant with pagination support. Categories are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

Query Parameters:
- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32
- active_only (optional): Set to 'true' to show only active categories

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of items
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of category items

request.description:
Get list of unique product categories for the authenticated tenant. Returns distinct category values from products table.

Example Response:
```json
{
  "data": [
    "Makanan Utama",
    "Minuman",
    "Snack & Dessert"
  ]
}
```

response.name: Get Categories Success

query.description: Search keyword in product name, description, or SKU (case-insensitive)

request.description:
Get list of all products for the authenticated tenant with pagination support. Products are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

Query Parameters:
- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32
- category (optional): Filter by exact category name
- search (optional): Search keyword in name, description, or SKU (case-insensitive)
- All filters can be combined with pagination

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of items
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of product items

Examples:
- All products page 1: /products?page=1&page_size=32
- By category: /products?category=Minuman&page=1
- By search: /products?search=ayam&page=1
- Combined: /products?category=Makanan%20Utama&search=goreng&page=2&page_size=32

request.description:
Create a new order with multiple products. Order will be automatically assigned to tenant and branch from JWT token.

Request body:
- items: Array of products with quantity
  - product_id: ID of product to order
  - quantity: Number of items
- notes: Optional order notes

Response includes:
- Order details with generated order number
- Total amount calculated from product prices
- Order items with product details

response.name: Create Order Success
response.body:
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "Order created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 3,
    "tenant_id": 17,
    "branch_id": 25,
    "user_id": 10,

request.description:
Create payment for an order. Payment amount must be equal to or greater than order total.

Request body:
- order_id: ID of order to pay
- amount: Payment amount (must be >= order total)
- payment_method: Method of payment (cash, card, transfer, qris)
- notes: Optional payment notes

Effect:
- Creates payment record
- Updates order status to 'completed'
- Cannot pay cancelled orders
- Cannot pay already completed orders

Response includes complete payment details for receipt:
- Payment information (ID, amount, method, change)
- Order details (order number, total, items)
- Product details (name, quantity, price, subtotal)
- Cashier and branch information

request.description:
Get daily payment statistics for the last N days. Returns array of daily data with qty and total amount for chart visualization.

Query Parameters:
- days (optional): Number of days to look back, default 7. Can be any positive number (1, 7, 30, 90, etc.)

Response:
- Array of daily payment statistics
- Each item contains: date, qty (number of transactions), total_amount (sum in Rupiah)
- Sorted by date ascending

Get list of all users for the authenticated tenant with pagination support. Users are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of users
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of user items

request.description:
Create a new user with OPTIONAL profile image upload. User will be automatically assigned to tenant_id from JWT token.

**Required Fields:**
- email: valid email format, globally unique
- password: min 6 characters
- full_name: user's full name
- role: staff | branchadmin | tenantadmin
- branch_id: must exist and belong to tenant
- is_active: true | false

**Optional Fields:**
- image: Profile image file (JPEG/PNG). Image will be uploaded to /uploads/profiles/

**How to test in Postman:**
1. Select 'image' field
2. Click 'Select Files'
3. Choose a JPEG/PNG image from your computer
4. Send request

**Response will include:**
- image: URL of uploaded image (e.g., "uploads/profiles/user_10_1234567890.jpg")
- OR null if no image was uploaded

response.name: Create User with Image Success
response.body:
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "User created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 11,
    "tenant_id": 17,
    "branch_id": 1,
    "email": "johndoe@example.com",
    "full_name": "John Doe",
    "role": "user",
    "is_active": true,
    "image": "uploads/profiles/user_11_1735291200.jpg",
    "created_at": "2025-12-27 11:00:00"
  }
}

formdata.description: Optional: New profile image (replaces old image)

request.description:
Update an existing user with OPTIONAL profile image replacement. Replace '1' in URL with actual user ID. User must belong to authenticated tenant.

**All fields are OPTIONAL - only send what you want to update:**
- full_name: User's full name
- role: staff | branchadmin | tenantadmin
- is_active: true | false
- password: New password (will be hashed)
- branch_id: New branch assignment
- image: New profile image (JPEG/PNG). Will REPLACE existing image.

**Partial Update Examples:**

1. **Update only name:**
   - Send only: full_name

2. **Update only image:**
   - Send only: image (file)

3. **Update name + image:**
   - Send: full_name + image

**How to test in Postman:**
1. Enable/disable fields you want to update
2. For image: Select 'image' field → Click 'Select Files'
3. Choose JPEG/PNG from your computer
4. Send request

**Response will include:**
- Updated user data with new image URL if uploaded

response.name: Update User with New Image Success
response.body:
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "User updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "tenant_id": 17,
    "branch_id": 1,
    "email": "user1@example.com",
    "full_name": "Jane Doe Updated",
    "role": "branchadmin",
    "is_active": true,
    "image": "uploads/profiles/user_1_1735291800.jpg",
    "created_at": "2025-12-27 10:00:00"
  }
}

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk mendapatkan Terms & Conditions. Content dibaca dari config table dengan key 'tnc'. Tidak memerlukan authentication.

Content TNC dapat diupdate melalui Config API:
- POST /api/v1/config/set dengan key="tnc" dan value berisi content baru
- Perubahan akan langsung terlihat di endpoint ini

response.name: Get TnC Success
response.body:
{
  "code": 0,
  "message": "Terms and conditions retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "title": "Terms and Conditions - MyPOS Core System",
    "content": "# Terms and Conditions - MyPOS Core System

## 1. Introduction
Welcome to MyPOS Core, a comprehensive Point of Sale system designed for multi-tenant and multi-branch businesses.

## 2. Acceptance of Terms
By accessing and using MyPOS Core, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

## 3. Service Description
MyPOS Core provides:
- Multi-tenant and multi-branch POS system
- User management with role-based access control
- Product and inventory management
- Order and payment processing
- Dashboard and reporting features

## 4. User Obligations
- Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
- Use the service in compliance with applicable laws
- Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to the system
- Report any security vulnerabilities to our team

## 5. Data Privacy
We are committed to protecting your data:
- All sensitive data is encrypted
- We do not share your data with third parties without consent
- You retain ownership of your business data

## 6. Service Availability
- We strive for 99.9% uptime
- Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance
- We are not liable for service interruptions beyond our control

## 7. Payment Terms
- Subscription fees are billed monthly or annually
- Payment must be made in advance
- Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis

## 8. Limitation of Liability
MyPOS Core is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for:
- Loss of data or business interruption
- Indirect or consequential damages
- Issues arising from misuse of the system

## 9. Termination
- Either party may terminate the agreement with 30 days notice
- Upon termination, you will have 60 days to export your data
- Outstanding fees must be paid before termination

## 10. Changes to Terms
- We reserve the right to modify these terms
- Users will be notified of material changes
- Continued use constitutes acceptance of modified terms

## 11. Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of Indonesia.

## 12. Contact Information
For questions about these terms, contact us at:
- Email: support@myposcore.com
- Phone: +62 xxx xxxx xxxx

Last Updated: January 3, 2026
Version: 1.0.0"
  }
}

body.raw:
{
  "key": "tnc_content",
  "value": "# Terms and Conditions

This is a test TNC content with multiple lines.

## Section 1
Content here..."
}

request.description:
Public endpoint untuk menyimpan atau update config key-value pair. Mendukung value hingga 128KB+.

Request Body:
- key (required): Config key sebagai identifier unik
- value (required): Config value (TEXT, support large content)

Jika key sudah ada, value akan di-update (UPSERT pattern).

## Section 1

request.description:
Create a new 6-digit PIN for the authenticated user. PIN must be exactly 6 numeric digits and match confirm_pin.

Validations:
- PIN must be exactly 6 digits
- PIN must be numeric only
- PIN and confirm_pin must match
- User must not have an existing PIN

response.name: Create PIN Success

request.description:
Change existing PIN for the authenticated user. Requires old PIN for verification.

Validations:
- All PINs must be exactly 6 digits
- All PINs must be numeric only
- Old PIN must be correct
- New PIN and confirm_pin must match
- New PIN must be different from old PIN
- User must have an existing PIN

response.name: Change PIN Success

request.description: Check whether the authenticated user has set a PIN or not. Useful to determine if user should create or change PIN.

response.name: Check PIN - Has PIN
Check PIN - No PIN

request.description:
Endpoint untuk admin/owner/superadmin mengubah PIN user lain. Role hierarchy: superadmin > owner > admin > user. User yang melakukan request harus memiliki role lebih tinggi dari target user.

Validations:
- PIN must be exactly 6 digits
- PIN must be numeric only
- PIN and confirm_pin must match
- Admin role must be higher than target user role
- Tenant isolation for non-superadmin
- Branch isolation for owner

response.name: Admin Change PIN Success
Admin Change PIN - PIN Mismatch
Admin Change PIN - Insufficient Permission

query.description: Filter by entity type (user, product, order, payment, category, faq, tnc)
Filter by action (create, update, delete, login, logout)

request.description: Get paginated list of audit trails with optional filters. All query parameters are optional.

response.name: List Audit Trails Success

request.description: Get a specific audit trail record by ID

response.name: Get Audit Trail Success

request.description:
Get complete audit history for a specific entity. Shows all changes made to this entity over time.

Supported entity types:
- user
- product
- order
- payment
- category
- faq
- tnc

response.name: Get Entity History Success

request.description: Get complete activity log for a specific user. Shows all actions performed by this user across all entities.
